alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene; Owen; Parke; Sullivan; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:28PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vigo, Sullivan, Clay, west central Owen, southwestern Parke, northwestern Greene and southern Vermillion Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Allerton to Paris to near Casey. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Terre Haute around 1145 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Clinton and Sullivan. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for southwestern and west central Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Greene; Owen; Parke; Sullivan; Vermillion; Vigo
